security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-only skill with no executable code. It contains only YAML frontmatter and markdown instructions for editing large Markdown reports. No network calls, filesystem access, or command execution capabilities.

content.user_title: Edit Large Research Reports with Precision
content.value_statement: Managing large research reports is difficult when edits can break structure or lose citations. This skill applies surgical patches and citation rules to modify documents safely while preserving accuracy and source references.
actual_capabilities: Apply surgical patches to large Markdown files without breaking structure
Use structure JSON for precise document modifications
Enforce legal-grade citation rules with StableID and page anchors
Create backups before major edits for safety
limitations: Cannot access files outside its own directory context
Cannot execute shell commands or scripts
Does not generate new content without source citations

use_cases.title: Edit Research Papers
use_cases.description: Modify large academic papers while preserving citations and maintaining document integrity across revisions.

use_cases.title: Update Documentation
use_cases.description: Apply targeted changes to extensive technical documentation without disrupting cross-references or formatting.

use_cases.title: Revise Legal Documents
use_cases.description: Edit lengthy legal documents with precision while tracking all citations and references accurately.

prompt_templates.title: Apply Small Edit
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply this change to the large report: [describe edit]. Use surgical patch and cite new statements with StableID.

prompt_templates.title: Review Changes
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the recent edits to the report. Ensure citations are intact and structure remains valid.

prompt_templates.title: Add New Section
prompt_templates.prompt: Add a new section to the report about [topic]. Include proper citations with StableID and page anchors.

prompt_templates.title: Bulk Update
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform comprehensive edits: [list changes]. Create backup first, apply surgical patches, verify all citations remain valid.

output_examples.input: Update the methodology section to include new validation steps from page 45 of source.pdf
output: Applied surgical patch to methodology section
Added new validation steps with citations
All references updated with StableID anchors

best_practices: Always create backups before applying surgical patches to large documents
Verify citation integrity after each editing session
Use chunked edits to maintain context safety for very large files
anti_patterns: Making bulk edits without creating a backup first
Applying patches without checking document structure integrity

faq.question: What file formats does this skill support?
faq.answer: This skill works with Markdown files. It can edit large research reports and documentation in MD format.

faq.question: What are the size limits for files?
faq.answer: The skill uses chunked editing to handle very large documents. It processes files in context-safe sections to avoid memory issues.

faq.question: Can I use this with cloud storage services?
faq.answer: This skill operates on local files within your workspace. Integration with cloud storage depends on your tool configuration.

faq.question: Is my data safe during editing?
faq.answer: Yes. The skill creates backups before major changes and verifies citation integrity. No data leaves your environment.

faq.question: Why are citations important?
faq.answer: Legal-grade citations ensure accuracy and traceability. Every new statement must have a StableID and page anchor for verification.

faq.question: How does this compare to other editors?
faq.answer: Unlike general editors, this skill specializes in large document safety with surgical patches, citation enforcement, and backup workflows.
